title: Safdarjung Hospital Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in for 107 Assistant Professor Posts
description: The Safdarjung Hospital has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 107 Assistant Professor Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS, Diploma, M.Sc., and MD/MS can apply for the Safdarjung Hospital Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview.
